entities.name: COVID-19
entities.description: COVID-19 is the disease that has prompted modifications in business and workforce practices.

entities.name: OUR EMPLOYEES
entities.description: Employees of the company who are impacted by changes in business practices due to COVID-19.

entities.name: OUR CUSTOMERS
entities.description: Customers of the company who are impacted by changes in business practices due to COVID-19.

entities.name: OUR PARTNERS
entities.description: Partners of the company who are impacted by changes in business practices due to COVID-19.

entities.name: OUR SUPPLIERS
entities.description: Suppliers of the company who are impacted by changes in business practices due to COVID-19.

entities.name: SECURITIES ANALYSTS
entities.description: Analysts who evaluate the securities of the company and whose expectations influence the stock price.

entities.name: INVESTORS
entities.description: Individuals or entities that invest in the company and are concerned with its financial performance.

entities.name: OUR OFFICES
entities.description: The physical office locations of the company that are impacted by COVID-19 restrictions.
